attributes.action: Prevent billionaires, lobbyists and companies from destroying democracy
attributes.additional_details: Democracy is under threat like never before. Technology is allowing nefarious individuals and groups to attack it in different ways. Too often, anti-democratic forces are able to sway opinions via opaque methods. The UK Govt needs to step up and face up to these iniquitous challenges.
attributes.background: Remove the reach of X, tackle foreign intervention into local politics, curb dodgy donations, investigate biased bought media, challenge Russian influence, defang predatory companies, halt lobbying & stop opaque access to the corridors of power!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about democracy in the UK, but we're not exactly sure what specific action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take.  

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

The UK Government has recently announced a review into foreign financial interference in UK politics: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/urgent-review-into-foreign-financial-interference-in-uk-politics

We've published these petitions which you may wish to sign: 

Establish review of risks to UK democracy from foreign influence on social media: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/748564

Call a public inquiry into Russian influence on UK politics & democracy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/744215
